bug.author: aiyou9
bug.description:
when I want to use nightly builds, I am download the source code using Git and run Label Studio locally，but when I run “python setup.py develop” ，It give me a bug as show below： <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15712822/95775433-ff513e00-0cf4-11eb-9c2d-fd1ce4dc6f9c.png></denchmark-link>
It can be fix by add the code in yellow box at file “setup.py ” <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15712822/95775780-9b7b4500-0cf5-11eb-8eed-38c57820af49.png></denchmark-link>
i wish it maybe help

comments.comment: We ll fix it in nearest release 🙂
